text: @AndrewScheer Hahahahaha... Nothing more to say. You are full of reasons without any constructive layouts. Compare to many countries, the Liberal did great on this matter. You are not elected PM, dealing with Covid-19 and a crazy Yahoo in the south...still we are successful? Why lie?
